statements: SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM public_transport_routes WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE travel_time < 60;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_id, distance, travel_time FROM public_transport_routes ORDER BY distance DESC, travel_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE travel_time < 60 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'City Center' AND end_location = 'Suburb' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, travel_time FROM public_transport_routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY start_location, end_location;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS route_count, SUM(distance) AS total_distance FROM public_transport_routes WHERE travel_time > 30;
SELECT * FROM routes
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time < '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules ORDER BY arrival_time
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'Chicago' ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'Los Angeles' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_long FROM stops WHERE stop_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, departure_time, arrival_time FROM routes r JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 2 ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stops WHERE stop_location LIKE '%airport%';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT s.stop_name, s.stop_location, sch.arrival_time, sch.departure_time FROM stops s INNER JOIN schedules sch ON s.stop_id = sch.stop_id WHERE sch.route_id = 3;
SELECT v.vehicle_type, v.vehicle_capacity, r.route_name FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN routes r ON v.vehicle_id = r.route_id WHERE v.vehicle_capacity > 50;
SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS total_stops FROM routes INNER JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id GROUP BY route_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM Stops WHERE stop_id > 5;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedules WHERE route_id = 3 ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM Stops WHERE stop_id > 10 ORDER BY stop_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE end_location LIKE 'New%' AND route_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Schedules ORDER BY schedule_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
